languages.text: "Подождите". {n}Взгляд Кибеллы, прежде задумчивый, проясняется.{/n} "Так это не было обычным явлением?.. Я решила, что это какой-то традиционный ритуал верхних палуб. Но не была уверена точно".
"Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."
languages.original_text: "Подождите". {n}Взгляд Кибеллы, прежде задумчивый, проясняется.{/n} "Так это не было обычным явлением?.. Я решила, что это какой-то традиционный ритуал верхних палуб. Но не была уверена точно".

"Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."

languages.text: «Un momento». {n}La mirada de Kibellah, hasta ahora pensativa, se aclara repentinamente.{/n} «Entonces ¿no es una práctica común? Pensaba que se trataba de un ritual tradicional de las cubiertas superiores, aunque tenía mis dudas».
languages.original_text: "Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."

traits.locale_text: «Un momento». {n}La mirada de Kibellah, hasta ahora pensativa, se aclara repentinamente.{/n} «Entonces ¿no es una práctica común? Pensaba que se trataba de un ritual tradicional de las cubiertas superiores, aunque tenía mis dudas».

languages.text: 「お待ちください」{n}今まで思案していたキベラの視線が、ふと晴れる。{/n}「つまり、一般的な行いではなかったのですか？上層デッキの伝統的な儀式だと思っていました。疑念を持ってはいましたが」
languages.original_text: "Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."

traits.locale_text: 「お待ちください」{n}今まで思案していたキベラの視線が、ふと晴れる。{/n}「つまり、一般的な行いではなかったのですか？上層デッキの伝統的な儀式だと思っていました。疑念を持ってはいましたが」

languages.text: “等等。”{n}刚刚看起来若有所思的绮贝菈，此刻目光突然变得澄澈起来。{/n}“也就是说，这并不是常见的做法吗？我原本以为这是上层甲板的传统仪式，尽管我也心怀疑虑。”
languages.original_text: "Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."

traits.locale_text: “等等。”{n}刚刚看起来若有所思的绮贝菈，此刻目光突然变得澄澈起来。{/n}“也就是说，这并不是常见的做法吗？我原本以为这是上层甲板的传统仪式，尽管我也心怀疑虑。”

languages.text: "Wartet." {n}Kibellahs Blick, bisher nachdenklich, wird plötzlich klar.{/n} "Es war also keine gängige Praxis. Ich hatte angenommen, es handle sich um ein traditionelles Ritual der oberen Decks. Obgleich ich meine Zweifel hatte."
languages.original_text: "Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."

traits.locale_text: "Wartet." {n}Kibellahs Blick, bisher nachdenklich, wird plötzlich klar.{/n} "Es war also keine gängige Praxis. Ich hatte angenommen, es handle sich um ein traditionelles Ritual der oberen Decks. Obgleich ich meine Zweifel hatte."

languages.text: « Un petit instant... {n}Le regard de Kibellah, jusqu'à présent pensif, s'éclaircit subitement.{/n} Vous dites que ce n'est pas une pratique courante ? J'ai cru qu'il s'agissait d'une tradition rituelle sur les ponts supérieurs. Encore que, je n'en étais pas tout à fait certaine. »
languages.original_text: "Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."

traits.locale_text: « Un petit instant... {n}Le regard de Kibellah, jusqu'à présent pensif, s'éclaircit subitement.{/n} Vous dites que ce n'est pas une pratique courante ? J'ai cru qu'il s'agissait d'une tradition rituelle sur les ponts supérieurs. Encore que, je n'en étais pas tout à fait certaine. »

languages.text: "Bekle." {n}Kibellah'nın şu ana dek düşünceli olan bakışları aniden netleşiyor.{/n} "Yani bu sıradan bir eylem değil miydi? Üst güvertelilere ait geleneksel bir davranış olduğunu varsaymıştım. Gerçi kuşku duymadım diyemem."
languages.original_text: "Wait." {n}Kibellah's gaze, thoughtful until now, suddenly clears.{/n} "So it wasn't a common practice? I assumed it was a traditional ritual of the upper decks. Although I had my doubts."
